article_text:
Even the biggest advertising budget and shrewdest marketing campaign can’t always rein in a full-fledged public relations disaster. Once negative public opinion is out there, a brand risks long-term damage that is hard to reverse.

This year, there were plenty of PR woes and blunders that quickly sparked outrage—before people moved on to the next...
